name: Shaking Robots Revenge
description:
Jason Davis goes on his final trip… to his office. He broke the coffee machine and somehow travelled 400 years into the future. A coffee machine wasn’t working for all these years. He appeared out of nowhere with guns in his pocket and had to defend himself from the revenge of the future office’s robot employees who are shaking due to lack of coffee.

Shaking Robots Revenge is a top down shooter where every 10 seconds weapon changes to a random one. Game made during Ludum Dare 51.

Use [W], [S], [A], [D] to move player; Use LPM to attack; Use [F] to toggle fullscreen.

Tools: MonoGame, C#, Gimp, Blender, sfxr
